ability.Water Absorb: This Pokemon is immune to Water moves and heals 1/4 of its max HP when hit by Water moves. When hit by Fire moves, Eruption Boost is triggered for 2 turns. When Eruption Boost is active, Special Attack is 1.5x and Steam Eruption deals 33% more damage to the target.

Steam Eruption.effect: Has a 30% chance to burn the target. The target thaws out if it is frozen. When Eruption Boost is active, deals 33% more damage to the target.

Fire Blast.effect: Has a 10% chance to burn the target.
